name: The Six Foot Tall Man Eating Chicken
overview: This homebrew text adventure game was an entry (the only entry) in XComp. It is a parody of the television series The X-Files. You are Agent Socks Molder, Paranormal Investigator, based at Rozwelle Police Station. Most of your days are spent investigating UFO sightings, alien abductions, children with telepathic powers, extra-terrestrial bacteria and the like. But today, your supervisor, Agent Dino Scaly, has a new assignment for you. There's been reports of a giant, man-eating chicken being sighted around town. He wants you to check it out.
